about_the_game: The Window Flags DLC offers a wide range of options to personalize your truck even further. Whether you are fine tuning your truck to match your own unique design or rooting for your favorite sports team on match day. The Window Flags DLC allows you to fly your flag with pride featuring hundreds of designs. Fluttering flags are simulated both at standstill and at different driving speeds. We also take into account different wind speeds. The resulting effect is a very real and dynamic flag!
detailed_description: The Window Flags DLC offers a wide range of options to personalize your truck even further. Whether you are fine tuning your truck to match your own unique design or rooting for your favorite sports team on match day. The Window Flags DLC allows you to fly your flag with pride featuring hundreds of designs. Fluttering flags are simulated both at standstill and at different driving speeds. We also take into account different wind speeds. The resulting effect is a very real and dynamic flag!
legal_notice: (C) 2016 SCS Software. All brand names, trademarks, registered marks, logos, and symbols on vehicles in the game are property of their rightful owners. Used with kind permission.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
